alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 2:55PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Worcester, east central Hampshire and east central Franklin Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 255 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Shutesbury, or 8 miles southwest of Orange, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. Locally heavy downpours. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Amherst, Orange, Holden, Spencer, Athol, Leicester, Montague, Templeton, Rutland, Sterling, West Boylston, Barre, Paxton, North Brookfield, Hubbardston, Princeton, Hardwick, Oakham, Leverett, and Shutesbury. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
